description: This file defines a React component named 'Preview' that safely renders provided HTML inside a sandboxed iframe. It sanitizes the HTML by removing scripts, iframes, inline event handlers, and certain link tags to prevent injection of malicious or unwanted content. It also handles rendering an empty state and detects if it's embedded inside a foreign iframe to avoid nested iframes.

methods.name: Preview({ html, height = 'calc(100vh - 64px - 32px)' })
methods.description: React functional component that sanitizes and displays HTML content in a sandboxed iframe, with considerations for embedded context and empty states.
